      • set_values_to_calc_sat

        public static void set_values_to_calc_sat(javafx.scene.control.TextField mass_text_field,
                                          javafx.scene.control.TextField velocity_text_field,
                                          javafx.scene.control.TextField distance_text_field)
        Changes the parameters of the satellite to the parameters given by the user

        Changes the values of the satellite which needs to be calculated to the parameters given by the user if unable to do so gives a error. If a parameter which te user wants to calculate has not been given. Gives a error. If with the given parameters calculations can not be made gives a error

        Parameters:
        mass_text_field - textfield for the input for mass
        velocity_text_field - textfield for the input for velocity
        distance_text_field - textfield for the input for distance

      • get_planet_info

        public static javafx.scene.layout.VBox get_planet_info()
        Checks which planet has been chosen and what needs to be displayed on the center screen.

        Checks which planet has been chosen and what needs to be displayed on the center screen. If it is just text returns the text. If it is text + text fields returns text + text fields

        Returns:
        text and posibly text fields
